BIO

My name is Yash Patel. I'm pursuing Computer Science Engineering from Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT), Anand (2018-2022). I am an enthusiastic fresher with highly motivated and leadership skills pursuing Bachelors in Computer Science & Engineering , successful in quickly building skills, self-teaching and acquiring new knowledge. Excellency in presenting and making people understand with some good communication skills . Always willing to innovate new things which can improve existing technology.
